forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 20C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 68F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph.
